participant_1.background:
My family is very supportive of me and they help me to cope with my anxiety.
i collect bugs in jars.
i build my own computers.
I enjoyed Comic Con with my husband last year.
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers.

participant_2.background:
I want to spend time with my children.
I like to share my recipes with my friends and learn new ones from them.
I wake up and spend some time tending to my flower garden.
I keep my hair a dark brown, so it doesn't show the sweat from my workouts.
i am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you! I have been keeping busy with my hobbies and family.
That's great! I have been enjoying spending time with my family as well.
I love spending time with my family. We always have so much fun together.
Me too! My family is very supportive and they always make me feel happy.
That is wonderful! My family is also very supportive. They are always there for me, no matter what.
I am so lucky to have such a great family.
Me too! I am very grateful for my family.
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy painting, cooking, and gardening. I also like to spend time with my children.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook and garden as well.
Me too! I love being creative in the kitchen and in the garden.
I agree! It is so much fun to create something delicious or beautiful.
It is! I love sharing my creations with my family and friends.
That's so nice! I love sharing my cooking with my family and friends too.
I am glad to hear that!
